mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_JOB_HIRE(ADDRESS ,ADDRESS_EN, ADDR_DT_EN, ADDR_DT_KOR, APPLY_WAY, BOARD_IDX, B_STATUS, CATE_CHILD_EN, CATE_CHILD_KO, CATE_PRNT_EN, CATE_PRNT_KO, DOMITORY, DO_EN, DO_KOR, EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, FOREIGN_LANGUAGE, GU_GUN_EUP_ENG, GU_GUN_EUP_KOR, HIRE_AGE_MAX, HIRE_AGE_MIN, HIRE_IDX, HIRE_NUMBER, HIT, INSURANCE, IP, MAJOR, MEALS, MEM_ID, PAYMENT_CODITION, PAYMENT_DETAIL, PREFER_SKILLS, PREPARE_DOC , REGDATE, SALARY_MAX, SALARY_MIN , TITLE, WORK_DETAIL, WORK_TIME, WORK_TYPE ) VALUES ( ADDRESS ,ADDRESS_EN, ADDR_DT_EN, ADDR_DT_KOR, APPLY_WAY, 2, 1, CATE_CHILD_EN, CATE_CHILD_KO, CATE_PRNT_EN, CATE_PRNT_KO, DOMITORY, DO_EN, DO_KOR, EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, FOREIGN_LANGUAGE, GU_GUN_EUP_ENG, GU_GUN_EUP_KOR, HIRE_AGE_MAX, HIRE_AGE_MIN, HIRE_SQ.NEXTVAL, HIRE_NUMBER, 0, INSURANCE, IP, MAJOR, MEALS, MEM_ID, PAYMENT_CODITION, PAYMENT_DETAIL, PREFER_SKILLS, PREPARE_DOC , SYSDATE, SALARY_MAX, SALARY_MIN , TITLE, WORK_DETAIL, WORK_TIME, WORK_TYPE )
